item.title: Enchant
item.dc:creator: @Hellz_Scape Hellz Scape
item.description:
@Hellz_Scape wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:2, topic:306966”]if (castSpell == ####) // spell's id { if (playerLevel[6] >= ##) { // replace #s with required magic level. if ((playerHasItemAmount(####, #) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(####, #) == false)) { sendMessage( "Message here"); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(####, #) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(####, #) == true)) { deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(####, #); addSkillXP((1000 * playerLevel[6]), 6); setAnimation(###); stillgfx(###, absY, absX); resetanim = ##; deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), #); } } else if (playerLevel[6] <= ##) { sendMessage( "Message here"); }

You should be able to figure out what to add/change to this code.[/quote]
That’s not the issue, the issue is the spell ID

Read full topic
